question.text: Which of following statement is incorrect regarding mitochondria?

options.text: Matrix possesses single ds circular DNA molecule and ribosomes of 70S type.
Site of aerobic and anaerobic respiration
Outer membrane forms the continuous limiting boundrary of the organelle, while inner membrane is folded into cristae.
Mitochondria divide by fission like division to increases its number.

solution.text: Mitochondria is the site for aerobic respiration only. Glycolysis is the common step for aerobic and anaerobic respiration which occurs in the cytoplasm. Further, anaerobic respiration occurs in the cytoplasm and the aerobic respiration occurs in the mitochondria with the release of carbon dioxide by utilizing oxygen.
